meanings.definition: Without regard to or consideration of
meanings.sent1: She continued to play, regardless of the rain.
meanings.sent2: He always helps others, regardless of his own needs.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the laser pointer, regardless of the fact that it couldn't catch it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a force of nature, unstoppable regardless of obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The sun shines brightly, regardless of the clouds in the sky.

meanings.sent1: Regardless, we will go on the trip as planned.
meanings.sent2: I will finish the project on time, regardless of any setbacks.
meanings.sent3: He ate the spicy food, regardless of knowing it would upset his stomach.
meanings.sent4: The team continued to fight, regardless of being outnumbered.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed beautifully, regardless of the harsh weather conditions.
